A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have watched Star wars through the years as a huge fan of the saga. What I got with last Jedi was an unfocused story with mediocre acting. I'm giving it a star for some great action sequences but the jokey nature of the story just undermines the weight it could have had. I am trying to keep this spoiler free but the two person adventure in the middle of the story has zero purpose except to maybe tick off a box for the international market. See it on a matinee for the big screen spectacle but keep your expectations on the story low and you may enjoy it. What a waste Disney.
